title: Join The Associated for THE EVENT on April 21
body:
Join The Associated for  on April 21, an evening you won’t soon forget! You’ll be amazed at how good it feels to suspend reality for an hour while with all of Jewish Baltimore – all while supporting the important work of The Associated.Prepare to be wowed by , Emmy Award winning mentalist and illusionist and one of most memorable contestants. In 2018, he joined an elite few, including  and , to have their own TV special on a major national network.  aired on NBC multiples times to rave reviews.This family-friendly virtual event is open to all households that have made a gift to the 2021 annual campaign. Haven’t made your gift yet? !
7:00 – 7:30 pm
Donors of $1,000+ and monthly donors are invited to see old and new friends and warm up for the show.
.
8:30 – 9:30 pm
Don’t want the party to end? Young adults, ages 22-39, are invited to meet and mingle and keep the magic going.
. Contact Jennifer Noparstak at ..Explore Baltimore Fishbowl Maryland to move 3,300 state employees to downtown Baltimore Monday Afternoon Headlines: Emergent BioSolutions halts vaccine production; Archdioces removes pastor amid sex abuse investigation; and more Turn a country club into a city park? Yes, say Roland Park residents. And they're willing to pay. Hot House: Hook & Ladder 13 for sale in Hollins Market; $500K, includes three fire poles Domino Sugar Baltimore to replace its iconic Inner Harbor sign The Dark Past of Baltimore's Rosewood Mental Hospital
